Text:
[quote]iRa Pro - Mobile Video Surveillance for First Responders and Security Professionals

iRa Pro is a mobile surveillance application for the iPhone or iPod touch that empowers you to increase the on site visibility of your security force without sacrificing situational awareness.

Quick access to cameras allows you to make time sensitive decisions easily from a remote location, making it ideal for first responders.

Integration with Milestone XProtect Enterprise server allows access to live camera video and control pan-tilt-zoom cameras through the server.[/quote]

lextechlabs.com/ira_pro
